entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023
